channel.title: Project [REBORN] - DELTA BASED 317
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/wbxea9.jpg[/img][/center]
Okay i decided to move on to a DELTA. The base i used was Miir-scape. It was a good base (since i only coding for 4 weeks now). But it wasn't the one i wanted, so i started to edit it and add stuff, add more stuff,... And now its becoming a much better source, less bugs, better economy, cooler to play (we allways have fun on it) verry good economy, much people that want to donate... So yhea i think this is a perfect way to learn coding. I hope when this project is done it will be an awesome to play source. Even i ask much help on MOPARSCAPE SERVER HELP topic. Its a way to learn !
Things i added: [code]-A new Combat game -much used commands that are used on other servers -fixed some shops (like cooking,there isnt a shop to buy it, well now it haves) -Staff shop added more items -fixed yell tags + added a donator tag -fixed some bonuses of items -Making a huge donator town -added some shops @home -new places -...[/code]
I will be adding pictures later !

@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[center][/center]

Okay i decided to move on to a DELTA. The base i used was Miir-scape.
It was a good base (since i only coding for 4 weeks now).
But it wasn’t the one i wanted, so i started to edit it and add stuff, add more stuff,… And now its becoming a much better source, less bugs, better economy, cooler to play (we allways have fun on it) verry good economy, much people that want to donate…
So yhea i think this is a perfect way to learn coding. I hope when this project is done it will be an awesome to play source.
Even i ask much help on MOPARSCAPE SERVER HELP topic. Its a way to learn !

-A new Combat game -much used commands that are used on other servers -fixed some shops (like cooking,there isnt a shop to buy it, well now it haves) -Staff shop added more items -fixed yell tags + added a donator tag -fixed some bonuses of items -Making a huge donator town -added some shops @home -new places -...
